level.heading: Prosecutions.
level.text: All prosecutions for violations of this chapter shall be in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia by the Attorney General for the District of Columbia or any of his assistants.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Criminal procedure, conduct of prosecutions, see § 23-101.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-354 substituted "Attorney General for the District of Columbia" for "Corporation Counsel".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-113
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-113, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2601.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Mayor authorized to issue rules: See notes to § 47-2601.
